prHeadline: Lytx Launches the Lytx Integration Network
headlineTxt: Aug 17, 2021, 08:30 ETLytx Launches the Lytx Integration Networknetwork gives Lytx's clients seamless access to an array of best-in-class solutions for superior fleet operations. Lytx is a leading provider of machine vision- and artificial intelligence-powered video telematics, analytics, safety, and productivity solutions for commercial, public sector, and field serviceMore news about: Lytx, Inc.
